description: Aurora (Nasdaq: AUR) is delivering the benefits of self-driving technology safely, quickly, and broadly to make transportation safer, increasingly accessible, and more reliable and efficient than ever before. The Aurora Driver is a self-driving system designed to operate multiple vehicle types, from freight-hauling trucks to ride-hailing passenger vehicles, and underpins Aurora Horizon and Aurora Connect, its driver-as-a-service products for trucking and ride-hailing. Aurora is working with industry leaders across the transportation ecosystem, including Toyota, FedEx, Volvo Trucks, PACCAR, Uber, Uber Freight, U.S. Xpress, Werner, Covenant, Schneider, and Ryder. For Aurora’s latest news, visit aurora.tech and @aurora_inno on Twitter.
name: Aurora
tagline: Aurora (Nasdaq: AUR) provides self-driving technology for safe, accessible, and efficient transportation.

updates.text: With industry-leading  partnerships and the first U.S. commercial-ready autonomous trucking route, the Aurora Driver is designed to deliver. Want an inside look at our terminals? Here's your chance. Buckle up!  #designedtodeliver

🇺🇸 This Veterans Day, we want to reflect on what it truly means to be a veteran and recognize the unique strengths veterans bring to the private sector.

🇺🇸 To be a veteran is to have dedicated oneself to something greater than personal gain. It's about commitment, resilience, and camaraderie.

🇺🇸 Veterans know what it means to keep pushing, adapt under pressure, and prioritize teamwork—traits that don’t just go away once military service ends.

🇺🇸 These skill sets are invaluable in the private sector. Veterans bring discipline, a strong work ethic, and the ability to make strategic decisions in high-stakes situations. 

🇺🇸 Many of us have been trained to lead with empathy and to keep our teams motivated through challenges. 

🇺🇸 Veterans are also adept at learning and adapting quickly, which makes them assets in fast-paced industries.

🇺🇸 Today, let’s honor the service and skills of our veterans, recognizing the incredible value they bring to their communities and workplaces. 

🇺🇸 Thank you to all who have served and continue to serve in different ways! 

#AUGVETNET
#VETERANSDAY
#VETERAN
Aurora

There will be a lot to love about autonomous trucks. They have the potential to make our roads safer, stabilize and strengthen supply chains, and help create jobs.

For more on the opportunities in trucking and our verifiable approach to AI and robust sensor suite, catch Sterling Anderson on the London Futurists: https://lnkd.in/eDJw56VR
Watch what happens when an autonomous truck powered by the Aurora Driver encounters barrels on the road. See more: https://bit.ly/3C8U6Z8

We’re on the brink of a new era in mobility and logistics. We’ve fully contracted our expected launch capacity, added half a billion dollars to our balance sheet, and announced our expansion to Phoenix. Our shareholder letter covers more on our Q3 progress: https://bit.ly/40leKiQ

We’re honored to hold the #1 spot on The Road to Autonomy®'s leaderboard for Autonomous Trucks. This recognition reflects our team’s dedication to advancing safe, reliable, and scalable autonomous solutions that push the future of transportation forward. https://bit.ly/3C4yu06
Exciting updates ahead as The Volvo VNL Autonomous, equipped with the Aurora Driver, hits Texas roads!

Trenton has been a pillar of the photonics industry in Montana, and an important lidar expert here at Aurora. Check out his interview to read about his dynamic career in photonics, his passion for building up the tech industry in Montana, and his commitment to improving road safety with autonomous vehicle technology.

Thrilled to see our CEO and co-founder, Chris Urmson, recognized by Nasdaq in Times Square for the 2024 Automotive Hall of Fame Mobility Innovator Award! This honor reflects his leadership in advancing autonomous vehicle technology.

The #AllNewVolvoVNL Autonomous is making waves at #ATAmce24!

Sasko Cuklev, Head of On-Road Solutions at Volvo Autonomous Solutions, is showcasing the cutting-edge technology designed to enhance transportation capacity. Don’t miss your chance to see it up close — visit us at booth #13125!

Aurora | #GuidedBySafety
